subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The 7-footer Jonathan Bender is attempting a comeback with the Knicks. The fifth overall pick in the 1999 draft, Bender had his career stalled by knee injuries in 2005.
snippet: The 7-footer Jonathan Bender is attempting a comeback with the Knicks. The fifth overall pick in the 1999 draft, Bender had his career stalled by knee injuries in 2005.
